FarmCaveChange.Description: Adds a custom farm cave with short cut to the Mines

SocialGuntherandMarlon.Description: Make friends with Gunther and Marlon

UnlockDwarfLater.Description: Select True to hides Dwarf until you meet them for the first time or can speak their language

EnablePlatonic14.Description: Set this to true if you wish to experience a platonic variant of Jasper's 14-heart event (ie: you do not intend to date or marry him)

PregnancyTalk.Description: If married to Jasper and female, your pregnancy will be discussed. Nothing graphic!

FirstChildGender.Description: Is your first child with Jasper male or female (features not yet implemented)

TwoToddlers.Description: Set this to true if you have two kids with Jasper (features not yet implemented)

AnniversarySeason.Description: Set the season you married Jasper

AnniversaryDayOfMonth.Description: Set the day you married Jasper

Entries.55991001/e 50709930/k 50709921/f Jasper: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2/addTemporaryActor Cameron 16 32 64 18 0 true Character/skippable/pause 1500/speak Cameron "Oh hi there! Can you help me, please?#$b#I've just arrived from Zuzu City, come to visit an old friend... and I'm lost.$2"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Cameron "Oh, sorry! My name's Peasbody, Professor Cameron Peasbody.$1#$b#Could you point me in the direction of the museum?$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/question fork0 "...#Follow the path into town, it's just over the stream.#You should go back to Zuzu. We don't want you here."/fork HelpCameron/pause 500/addMailReceived Cameron_Unwelcome/emote Cameron 60/pause 1500/speak Cameron "I thought village folk were meant to be friendly.$5"/pause 500/emote farmer 12/pause 2500/faceDirection farmer 0/warp farmer -100 -100/playSound doorClose/viewport 61 16/pause 1000/emote Cameron 28/pause 500/faceDirection Cameron 2/speak Cameron "Okay... I suppose I deserved that.$2#$b#But...$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Cameron 0/pause 1500/speak Cameron "This might be harder than I thought...$2"/pause 2000/end
Entries.HelpCameron: pause 500/speak Cameron "Thanks! I'll see you around; I hope to be here for a while.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Cameron 2/pause 1500/faceDirection Cameron 0/speak Cameron "Oh, hey, I hear there's a saloon in town. We could meet up for a drink there sometime.#$b#If you wanted to, that is?$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/speak Cameron "Hey, no need to answer now. Don't be a stranger, okay? Later!"/pause 1500/faceDirection Cameron 2/pause 1500/end
